title: Lots of 09 Obaks in mid-high grade available!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Lots of 09 Obaks in mid-high grade available!
posts.post_content:
I have quite a few very nice 09 Obaks that I'd like to make available today.  As you all know, 09 Obaks are very difficult to find in general, much less in this nice of shape.  Only 41 1909 Obaks have graded out higher than SGC 70.  

I'm not looking to give up on this set soI would be reluctant to sell these directly; rather, I'd prefer to either downgrade these or trade for cards that are higher up on my "priority list".  

Brackenridge SGC 60 (horizontal)
Brown SGC 70 (horizontal - only one graded higher!)
Browning SGC 70 ( only one graded higher!)
Cameron SGC 50
Flannagan SGC 40
D. Lewis SGC 50
McKune SGC 40
Mundorff SGC 50
Nelson SGC 60 (horizontal)
Smith SGC 40
R. Williams SGC 40

----------------------------------------

In addition to downgrading these particular obaks, here are the cards I'm looking for in trade --

w590 (need 1) - Spencer

w517 minis (need 5) - Collins, Grove, T.Jackson, Miller, O'Doul

w553 (need 5) - Blue, Foxx, Maranville, Miller, Traynor

e90-3 - any common

e103s (need 6) - Chase, Donovan, Jordan, Lajoie, Matty, McLean,  

d311s (need 5) - Daley, Delhi, Lewis, Maggert, Wares

e98 commons - need any

t210 orange borders - need any

eunc orange borders - need any common

1911 Baseball bats - need all

1918 Zeenuts - need any

1919 Zeenuts (need 7) - Lane (oak), Pinelli (sac), Prough (sac), Vance (sac), Seaton (SF), Snell (SF), Arbuckle (Vern), Meusel (vern)

1909 Obaks (need 32) - Bernard, Berry, Boyce, Brashear, Breen, D. Brown, Byrnes, Coy, Delmas, Fisher, Fitzgerald, Gandil, Graham, Guyn, Harkins, W. Hogan, Howse, C. Lewis, J. Lewis, McCredie, Mott, Nagle, Olson, Ornsdorff, Reidy, Ryan, Shinn, Speas, Stovall, Wiggs, Willett, J. Williams

The cards in this group are still available....willing to trade or downgrade.  Especially looking to trade for ANY common card from the e103, e98 or e90-3 set.  Thanks guys!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
